summary: The module establishes a Pint UnitRegistry for the xclim library and implements a suite of utilities for handling physical units. It provides mechanisms to declare expected units for variables, convert values between units, map Pint units to CF-compliant strings, and wrap functions with automatic unit validation and conversion. Additional helper functions support string transformations and unit arithmetic.
business_intent: Enable reliable unit management and conversion within climate data processing, ensuring that calculations adhere to correct physical dimensions and CF conventions.
